name: middleweight

a boxer who weighs more than a welterweight but less than a light heavyweight, or this division of boxing weight: At college he had boxed as a middleweight. She's the current undisputed junior middleweight champion. Hagler's first attempt at the middleweight title came in 1979. He won his first world title at middleweight. Compare
